email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider something in the high 40s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $49.75 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $49.75 sounds reasonable. However, the demurrage rate is still on the higher side. Could we negotiate it down to $22,000 per day? Also, can we confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October? Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve discussed your counteroffer with the owner. We can agree to a demurrage rate of $22,500 per day, pro rata. The laycan remains 15-20 October. If this works for you, I’ll prepare the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for your flexibility. $22,500 per day for demurrage is acceptable. Please proceed with preparing the charter party agreement. Let’s aim to finalize by end of day. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Charter Party Agreement
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! I’ve attached the draft charter party agreement for your review. The agreed terms are: freight rate of $49.75 per metric ton, demurrage at $22,500 per day, and laycan 15-20 October. Please review and let me know if any changes are needed. Best regards, Sarah
